cast.name: 盖伊·克莱门斯 Guy Clemens

introduction: The series follows the life of the recently graduated law student Sabia. Sabia earns an appointment as a lawyer-trainee at the prestigious law firm Van de Sande Grinten Meijer. The law firm is run by Christine Meijer and Rudolf van de Sande Grinten. The partners try to maintain the quality and visibility of the office at all costs in a power-hungry and status-sensitive world. Sabia is also confronted with the fast and hard world of the legal profession at the Zuidas. She shares her experiences with also starting and estranged lawyer Quinten.
